word_group.brief_definition: 狩猎的技巧；猎捕技能；狩猎技能
猎区；猎场；有希望能看到（或找到）所寻求东西的地方
猎狐者穿的红色衣服或衣料
狩猎步枪；打猎步枪；猎枪
逢低买入；购买便宜货；趁低吸纳
狩猎执照；狩猎证；狩猎许可证
狩猎保护区；禁止狩猎区域
狩猎禁令；捕猎禁令；禁止捕杀
打猎的小屋；猎人的屋子

bilingual.target: 大规模灭绝是由狩猎引起的。
猎场看守人维护狩猎设备。

bilingual.source: The dingo is known for its hunting skills.
bilingual.target: 澳洲野狗以其狩猎技能而闻名。

bilingual.source: He bought a new rifle for the hunting season.
bilingual.target: 他为狩猎季买了一支新步枪。

bilingual.source: They went hunting for deer early in the morning.
bilingual.target: 他们一大早就去狩猎鹿了。

bilingual.source: We used a high-power sight while hunting.
bilingual.target: 我们在狩猎时使用了高倍瞄准镜。

bilingual.source: He bought a new sniper rifle for hunting.
bilingual.target: 他购买了一把新的狙击步枪用于狩猎。

bilingual.source: He enjoys hunting in the forest during the weekends.
bilingual.target: 他喜欢在周末去森林里狩猎。

bilingual.source: He bought a box of bullets for his hunting trip.
bilingual.target: 他为他的狩猎之旅买了一盒子弹。

yingyinNormal.en: What is it doing now? It's hunting. Hacking into the security cameras at Ethihad Towers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在在做什么？狩猎，现在我正黑入艾提哈德塔里的安保系统。

yingyinNormal.en: Except for the summer and then we'd shelter with various hunting, shooting and fishing relations.
yingyinNormal.zh: 除了夏天的时候，我们会暂住亲戚家，一起狩猎钓鱼什么的。

yingyinNormal.en: What do you know about Law? Raksha. Hunting for pleasure. Killing for power. You've never known Law.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你有什么资格谈论法则？拉克莎，你为了消遣而狩猎，为了权力而杀戮，你根本就不懂法则。

yingyinNormal.en: She wants to go hunting too!
yingyinNormal.zh: 她也想去打猎喔！

yingyinNormal.en: Heronymous Bot. The FBI's been hunting him for years.
yingyinNormal.zh: Heronymous 机器人。联邦调查局已经追捕他很多年了。

yingyinNormal.en: Promise? I promise. Thank you. Well, I am going hunting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 保证吗？我保证。谢谢。不过我会去打猎的。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't eat veal. I can't wear fur. I can't go hunting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不能吃小牛肉，我不能穿皮草，我不能去打猎。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you want to go hunting? I would like to have the option.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想要去打猎吗？至少我要有选择的权利。

yingyinNormal.en: They're hunting for us now. We've gotta get out of this system!
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们现在还在追捕我们，我们必须得离开这个星系！

yingyinNormal.en: She's hunting him. Skilled at surveillance and she fights like a pro.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她在追捕他，监视熟练，搏斗专业。

yingyinNormal.en: Please don't let them hurt him. But we're hunting, you see. It's what's done.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请不要让他们伤害它。但我们在打猎，知道吗？我们只能这么做。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait, wait. Sacks and Shredder? So, why aren't we out there hunting them down?
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，等等，萨克斯和施莱德？那我们为什么不去把他们杀掉？

yingyinNormal.en: So apparently I'm available for lunch. I can't. I'm busy. I'm apartment hunting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很明显地，我午餐时间有空。我没办法，我很忙，我在找房子。

yingyinNormal.en: Shift your hunting ground for a few years and everyone forgets how the Law works.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这片猎场到你手里才几年，所有人都忘了法则是怎么说的吗？

yingyinNormal.en: My husband died in a tragic hunting accident. It must have been traumatic for you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我丈夫打猎时意外惨死。你还是真是伤心啊。

yingyinNormal.en: So you are the one they call Oakenshield. Tell me, why is Azog the Defiler hunting you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你就是那个橡木盾？告诉我，为什么亵渎者阿佐格要追杀你？

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe it enough treasure hunting. Who wants to help me to build a big sand castle? Me. Me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看来我们寻宝寻得差不多了。谁想来帮忙堆一个非常大的沙堡呢？我！我！

yingyinNormal.en: You know, like write a play. Write a movie. I mean, what about those Good Will Hunting guys?
yingyinNormal.zh: 例如写个戏剧或者电影剧本，就像《心灵捕手》里的那两个角色。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, it's better than hunting them down. Yeah, why not? If it fails, no harm done anyway, right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 总比被动地找他们要好，可以试试，就算失败，也没什么坏处。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, Ben? We need you to help us get the ISDA. If we get a hunting license, we can short this crap.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是这样的，本，我们需要你帮我们拿到ISDA协议，有了协议在手，我们才能做空。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 猎人；猎手；猎兽；有护盖的手表；（Hunter）人名：亨特
n. 打猎；狩猎；简单变奏；寻找；搜索

word_family.mean: v. 打猎；追猎；猎取；猎杀；射杀；摆动；振荡；振动；变化顺序

examination_example.sentence: They have to be sensitive to the changing light levels because this is how they sense when to start <highlight>hunting</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们必须对光线的变化保持敏感，因为这是它们感知何时开始捕猎的方式。

examination_example.sentence: The robots have provided major benefits to farmers, from <highlight>hunting</highlight> and pulling weeds to monitoring the condition of every single fruit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 机器人以各种方式为农民提供了巨大利益，包括从打猎和拔草到监测每一种水果的状况。

examination_example.sentence: Watch a film about ways of job <highlight>hunting</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看一部关于求职方法的电影。

sense_info_list.en: chasing and killing wild animals and birds as a sport or for food

examination_example.sentence: But can anyone be sure if the decline is really caused by the <highlight>hunting</highlight> or by climate change?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但有人能确定这种下降是真的由狩猎或是气候变化造成的吗？

examination_example.sentence: I can't believe that duck <highlight>hunting</highlight> is still legal in so many parts of the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我不敢相信在世界上这么多地方猎鸭仍然是合法的。

examination_example.sentence: Over-<highlight>hunting</highlight> could lead to the disappearance of the whale population, possibly causing major problems to the global food chain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 过度捕猎可能会导致鲸鱼数量的减少，这可能会给全球食物链带来重大问题。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 猎人；猎手；猎兽；有护盖的手表；（Hunter）人名：亨特
n. 打猎；狩猎；简单变奏；寻找；搜索

word_family.mean: v. 打猎；追猎；猎取；猎杀；射杀；摆动；振荡；振动；变化顺序

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 狩猎的技巧；猎捕技能；狩猎技能

examination_example.sentence: Farming produced more food per person than <highlight>hunting</highlight> and gathering, so people were able to raise more children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 农业比狩猎和采集提供了更多的人均食物，所以人们能够抚养更多的孩子。

examination_example.sentence: During the long trip home, following a weekend of <highlight>hunting</highlight>, Ehlers thought about the small dog he had seen trembling alongside the road.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个周末的狩猎结束后，在回家的漫漫旅途中，Ehlers想起了他看到的那条在路边颤抖的小狗。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

examination_example.sentence: She talked about environmental problems like pollution and the <highlight>hunting</highlight> of animals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她谈到了污染和猎杀动物等环境问题。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Hunting</highlight> also seems to be responsible for a whole set of bodily abilities, such as balancing on one foot.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 狩猎似乎对一整套身体机能都有关，比如单脚平衡。
